actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require a balanced budget within five years, in accordance with a schedule gradually reducing the maximum amount of the deficit which is permitted under the congressional budget process.

summary.text: Requires, under the Congressional Budget Act of 1974, that the Federal budget deficit for fiscal years 1978-1980 be a specified decreasing percentage of the deficit for fiscal year 1977. States that beginning with fiscal year 1981 Congress may not consider a Federal budget which includes a deficit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require a balanced budget within five years, in accordance with a schedule gradually reducing the maximum amount of the deficit which is permitted under the congressional budget process.
